props.item: The command palette item data object to render. This should be one of the items from the command palette's items array.
props.index: The zero-based index of this item in the selectable items list. Used for keyboard navigation and ARIA attributes.
props.tag: HTML tag to use for the root element. Defaults to 'div'.

slots.default: Provides complete control over item rendering within custom layouts. Scoped slot receives: `item` (raw item data), `index` (item position), `selected` (boolean selection state), `props` (computed accessibility and styling props).
